name: Homarr
short_description: Modern customizable dashboard with 30+ integrations and 10K+ icons.
description: Modern customizable dashboard with 30+ integrations and 10K+ icons. Homarr is a self-hosted application focused on dashboard, tools, monitoring, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Homarr on your home server to modern customizable dashboard with 30+ integrations and 10k+ icons without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Homarr to manage your dashboard workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
